## hpr2686 :: (NOT) All About Blender - Part the Second

 The second part of what began as a serious attempt to sit down and discuss Blender, a free and open-source piece of awesome, that slowly (rapidly) devolved into a meandering discussion. Mostly about video games.

https://openmw.org/en/
https://www.blender.org/
https://www.blender.org/support/tutorials/
https://danielpocock.com/quick-start-blender-video-editing
https://m.youtube.com/user/BlenderFoundation
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=_lGfeS050Xw
https://zombiemud.org/

BloodPong
